PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2003-21562003-12-22,  ,  HERITAGE,  , 
ActCanadian Radio-television and Telecommunications Commission Act
PrecisReappointment of DAVID C. COLVILLE of Halifax, Nova Scotia, to be a full-time member of the Canadian Radio-television and Telecommunications Commission to hold office during good behaviour for a term of one year; designation of DAVID C. COLVILLE, a representative of the Atlantic region, and determines that he shall reside within 100 kilometres of the Atlantic regional office; and designation of DAVID C. COLVILLE to be Vice-Chairperson of the Canadian Radio-television and Telecommunications Commission; effective January 1, 2004.
AttachmentsAttachment
